vlive.korean: 옆에 졸업장이 있어요... My diploma is next to me. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임

vlive.korean: 우리 점점 옆으로 가고 있어! We are slowly going to the side! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: We are slowly going to the side!

vlive.korean: 옆 멤버에게 가장 부러운 점은? What do you envy each other most for? 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 귀여운 2인 1조 TMI 인터뷰 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: What do you envy each other most for?

vlive.korean: 그때도 문예찬이 네 옆에 남아있을 거 같아? Do you think he'll still stay besides you? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 적어도 난 진짜 연애중이야 #남사친이_불편해졌다 #삼각관계 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP5
vlive.english: Do you think he'll still stay besides you?

vlive.korean: 방금 옆에 있던 친구요? Oh, are you talking about the guy who was here in the beginning? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: Oh, are you talking about the guy who was here in the beginning?

examples.korean: She turned luxuriantly on her side, yawning. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 하품을 하며 느긋이 옆으로 돌아누웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She turned luxuriantly on her side, yawning. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Melted wax dribbled down the side of the candle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 양초 옆으로 녹은 촛농이 줄줄 흘렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Melted wax dribbled down the side of the candle. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The truck skidded sideways across the road. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 트럭은 옆으로 미끄러지면서 도로를 넘어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The truck skidded sideways across the road. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The car skidded and crashed broadside into another car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 차가 미끄러지더니 다른 차를 옆으로 들이받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car skidded and crashed broadside into another car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He got undressed in a small cubicle next to the pool. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 풀장 옆에 있는 작은 칸막이 안에서 옷을 벗었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He got undressed in a small cubicle next to the pool. Add to Wordbook
